data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 234 believers in Nabeul, Tunisia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nabeul, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Nabeul to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 234 believers in Nabeul that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 157 new simple churches in the state of Nabeul, Tunisia. Place a simple church in every community of the 787,900 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Amazigh, Zaghouan people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Nabeul, Tunisia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Nabeul.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Nabeul.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
